name: Five In A Row - Fruit Version - Color Line - Link5
name_original: Five In A Row - Fruit Version - Color Line - Link5
description:
Five In A Row Fruit Version. Color Line game.

Put the fruit on the fruit plate, five together in the same fruit together, can be eliminated, each time to eliminate 10 points, the more the better. Join the global leaderboard.

Both straight line & slash all can be eat fruit.
